s0123: Qi said: 'Govern hundred officials, close ten thousand people, fill treasuries storehouses, you which with Qi?'
s0124: Wen said: 'Not as good as you.'
s0125: Qi said: 'Guard Xih√© and Qin troops dare not east face, Han Zhao submit follow, you which with Qi?'
s0126: Wen said: 'Not as good as you.'
s0127: Qi said: 'These three, you all below me, yet position above me, why?'
s0128: Wen said: 'Lord young state doubtful, ministers not attached, people not trusting, at this time, entrust to you or entrust to me?'
s0129: Qi silent good long while, said: 'Entrust to you.'
s0130: Wen said: 'This is why I reside above you.'
s0131: Wu Qi then self knew not as good as Tian Wen.
s0132: Tian Wen having died, Gong Shu became chancellor, married Wei princess, yet harmed Wu Qi.
s0133: Gong Shu's servant said: 'Qi easy to remove.'
s0135: His servant said: 'Wu Qi as person principled frugal yet self loves reputation.
s0136: Lord thus first with Wu Hou speak: 'Wu Qi worthy person, yet Hou's state small, moreover with strong Qin borders, subject secretly fear Qi has no staying heart.'
s0138: Lord thus told Wu Hou: 'Try betroth with princess, Qi has staying heart then certainly accepts.
s0139: No staying heart then certainly declines.
s0141: Lord thus summoned Wu Qi and betrothed with him, immediately made princess angry and belittle lord.
s0142: Wu Qi seeing princess belittles lord, then certainly declines.'
s0143: Thus Wu Qi seeing princess belittles Wei chancellor, indeed declined Wei Wu Hou.
s0144: Wu Hou doubted it yet not believed.
s0145: Wu Qi feared obtaining crime, thus departed, went to Chu.
s0146: Chu Dao Wang originally heard Qi worthy, arrived then made chancellor of Chu.
s0147: Clarified laws examined commands, discarded not urgent officials, abolished ducal clan distant ones, to nurture fighting soldiers.
s0148: Essentials in strengthening troops, broke galloping persuaders' words of alliances.
s0150: north annexed Chen Cai, repelled three Jin;
